title: Content Guard Configuration
description: Configuration for the VeniceAI content safety guard

comments.contextScoreThreshold: Weighted risk score above this value triggers block (default: 10)
comments.clusterMatchThreshold: Minimum terms needed from each cluster set to trigger (default: 2)
comments.hammingDistanceThreshold: Max bit difference for simhash matches (default: 5, range: 0-64)
comments.soundexMinLength: Minimum word length for soundex matching (default: 4)
comments.jaccardThreshold: Minimum similarity for Jaccard matches (default: 0.75, range: 0-1)
